subject: Football (College)
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Ohio State Coach Urban Meyer has disciplined four of his players for legal problems, including suspending the Buckeyes’ leading scorer, Carlos Hyde, who is suspected of assaulting a woman.
snippet: Ohio State Coach Urban Meyer has disciplined four of his players for legal problems, including suspending the Buckeyes’ leading scorer, Carlos Hyde, who is suspected of assaulting a woman.
